feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -13.3°C

Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
